org.drip.spline.bspline

Class CubicRationalRightRaw

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.quant.function1D.AbstractUnivariate
      • org.drip.spline.bspline.TensionBasisHat
        • org.drip.spline.bspline.CubicRationalRightRaw

  • public class CubicRationalRightRaw
extends TensionBasisHat
    CubicRationalRightRaw implements the TensionBasisHat interface in accordance with the raw right cubic rational hat basis function laid out in the basic framework outlined in Koch and Lyche (1989), Koch and Lyche (1993), and Kvasov (2000) Papers.
